thread.section_title: CoolFrames.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CoolFrames.com | www.coolframes.com | 6 of 16
thread.title: Tiamoriah Gusman

author: Tiamoriah Gusman
title: Tiamoriah Gusman
text: I'm satisfied. After looking at other reviews, I was skeptical about ordering, but I decided to give cool frames a try anyway. I do wear bifocals but I purchased my frames with single vision and will have my prescription put in at my local optometry office. I am not sure if that may have been the reason why my transaction went so smoothly. It seems like people who had complaints had ordered the frames with the prescription in them and had to wait an extended period of time for that reason. The frames were here within 7 business days of my purchase and my frames were in perfect shape. I am very happy with the look of the frames. They are exactly as they appeared online.
